question: {name} went to buy some school supplies. He bought {n1} {obj1} which cost {cur}{c1} each, {n2} {obj2} which cost {cur}{c2} each, and a ream of bond paper which cost {cur}{c3}. He also bought {n4} {obj3} which cost {cur}{c4} each. {name} can either pay a one-time {cur}20 fee to become a member and get a 20% discount on all purchases, or not become a member and receive only a 5% discount. What is the least amount {name} can spend on everything?
